890860.name: Frontline Heroes VR - 2017 Edition
890860.description:
The 2017 Beta Edition of Frontline Heroes VR
Since we have completely rebuilt the game, there is the Early Access Edition Free as DLC

Fight in different scenarios against Humans, Zombies, Bugs, Mummies, Werewolves, Dragons, Aliens, Rats, Drones and more in VR.

Many Weapons and Enemies in different Scenarios, through Kills you get Money what you can spend in the Shop for Weapons, Hero improvements and Slow Motions.

  • 12 Ranged Weapons
  • 6 Melee Weapons
  • 17 Enemies
  • Slow Motion Function
  • 6 Scenarios
  • Shop System
890860.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
